item.title: The Solidity Indexed Modifier
item.description: In Solidity, the indexed modifier is used to declare parameters in events (event) and indicates that the value of the parameter should be indexed. The purpose of the indexed modifier is to create a searchable index for event parameters, allowing for more efficient filtering and retrieval of events.
